gallery.gallery_title: New Book and Exhibition Explore the Art of Air Traffic Control Towers

gallery_slide.gallery_image_caption: Barcelona El-Prat Airport, Spain, built in 1965.
Fort Worth Alliance Airport, Texas, built in 1992. Russo chose to photograph contemporary towers based on esthetics and architecture, and older towers based on their historical significance.

Birmingham Airport, United Kingdom, built in 2012. In addition to the the book, an exhibition of Russo’s work will open at the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum in November, and travel to other venues in the future.
